Dialogue.Page: Outer Wilds Ventures is proud to celebrate the graduation and upcoming maiden voyage of our newest astronaut!
Please give them your congratulations and best wishes before they take off, and see our young hatchling take off with a proud smile!
We will be throwing a party around the campfire tonight in their honor ahead of time, before Riebeck takes off again. We welcome all of you to take part in this celebration!
PS: Please help clean up and take down the decorations afterwards this time.
